data.message: Do you think FB users would like to have an option to send a private message or post to a page at a different time of Day, Week or Month. Here are some reasons this would be useful; 1. To not cause a message alarm on a cell phone at an unwelcome time. 2. To make it appear one is posting at home while they are away. 3. To send a congratulation on or at a specific time and not forget. 4. To hide (or disguise) ones activity at a certain time. The latter may not be reasonable or ethical (especially if hiding cheating on a partner) but the first two are very valid reasons for this request. What can you do?

replies.message: Hey, Ml. We truly appreciate feedback from the Facebook community and we use it to help inform our decisions. Please keep sharing your feedback and we'll keep working hard to improve the Facebook experience for everyone. -Monica
